entry.summary: Environment Details On-Premise Two Domain Controllers runing windows Server 2016 OPDC01 - 10.10.1.10 OPDC02 - 10.10.1.11 Azure A Hybrid Vnet in Azure connected via VPN to on-premise network. Two Domain Controllers running Windows Server 2019 Datacenter edition. AZDC01 - 192.168.1.10 AZDC02 - 192.168.1.11 Other couple of VMS running Windows Server 2019...
